name: Candy Gems - New Best Match 3 Puzzle Game
name_original: Candy Gems - New Best Match 3 Puzzle Game
description:
Candy Gems Garden is a new 3-match FREE game, a very addictive Match 3 Candy game. You only need touch and arrange 3 same colored Candy to explode. The faster and the more Candy you arrange, the higher scores you get, you may never get bored in Candy Garden.
Ready for touch and drag your finger for link some Candy? Use Candy for Crush cages smash Jelly, Splash Candy.
The Match 3 is a very addictive Match 3 Candy game.

Game Target In Level:
- Target Score - Swipe Candy to reach the required score and get the stars
- Get the targets before the time runs out
- Splash the Candy and collect all the Drinks
- Destroy all the Dirty Sugar Candy blocks
- Destroy Sugar Bomb until they explode
- Break Jelly Cages

How to play:
- Drag the Candy, match three or more to clear Candy blast and earn points.
- Win the levels before you run out of moves or end of time. It's so easy.

Features:
- Delicious Candy beautiful visual image very cool.
- Fun and easy to learn, difficult in a higher level.
- 100+ well designed levels (on working more levels)
- Sweet powerful combo boosters and delicious power ups
- Stunning graphics and unique gameplay
- Play with your Friends
- Share your score with your Facebook friends
- Free to play
